Plugin Controls

  1. Home
  2. Forms
  3. Plugin Controls
Bootstrap Awesome Checkbox http://awesome-bootstrap-checkbox.okendoken.com/demo/index.html

Add the css file reference in the html head section
<link href="plugin/awesome-checkbox" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css">

Bootstrap TouchSpin http://www.virtuosoft.eu/code/bootstrap-touchspin/

Add the css and javascript file references in the html head section
<link href="plugins/bootstrap-touchspin/jquery.bootstrap-touchspin.min.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css">
<script href="plugins/bootstrap-touchspin/jquery.bootstrap-touchspin.min.js"><script>

Examples

noUiSlider http://refreshless.com/nouislider/

noUiSlider

noUiSlider is a range slider without bloat. It offers a ton off features, and it is as small, lightweight and minimal as possible, which is great for mobile use on the many supported devices, including iPhone, iPad, Android devices & Windows (Phone) 8 desktops, tablets and all-in-ones. It works on desktops too, of course!
